mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_PATH AS memberPath, MEMBER_ID AS memberId, GONGGU_NUMBER AS gongguNumber, COUNT_NUMBER AS countNumber FROM PRODUCT_TBL LEFT JOIN GONGGU_TBL USING(PRODUCT_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER_TBL USING(MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN DETAIL_GONGGU_TBL USING(GONGGU_NO) WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{_parameter}
